mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_table_rule(cid, tid, rule_weight, type, value_appear, value_range, appear_times, appear_ratio, ext_info) VALUES (#{cid}, #{tid}, #{ruleWeight}, #{type}, #{valueAppear}, #{valueRange}, #{appearTimes}, #{appearRatio}, #{extInfo})
mapper.select: SELECT rid as rid, cid as cid, tid as tid, rule_weight as ruleWeight, type as type, value_appear as valueAppear, value_range as valueRange, appear_times as appearTimes, appear_ratio as appearRatio, ext_info as extInfo FROM sys_table_rule where cid = #{cid}
